arts.ttl: South Korea vs. Bolivia broadcast – Time and channel to watch the match
arts.sum: South Korea faces Bolivia this Friday at 12 PM CET, with broadcast not guaranteed in France. The match will be played at Daejeon Stadium as a friendly. One Paris Saint-Germain player is involved in the South Korean side: Lee Kang-In (24-year-old attacking midfielder/winger). Find information about the broadcast of this South Korea vs. Bolivia match […]
